overview: Vijay Raaz and Gauri Karnik star in freshman director Kumar A. Dave's offbeat film about a beggar named Bholu. When she cuts in on his business in front of a temple, Bholu is irked until she disappears the next day and his anger turns into angst. Little does he know a seed of love has sprouted -- one that will soon change his makeshift existence.
title: Prarambh
